summary: Allyson L. Conley, PA-C, had her license suspended for misappropriating narcotics (Tylenol with Codeine, Vicodin) from her employers (Clinic 1 and Hospital 1) for personal use, consuming them while on duty, and falsifying medical records due to opiate dependence. Her license is retroactively suspended from November 10, 2015, and she must enroll in and comply with the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program before petitioning for reinstatement.
